## Plane.transform() method

Create a new plane object by transforming another plane.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static transform(plane: Plane, matrix: Matrix4x4, result?: Plane): Plane;
```

</th><th>

Description

</td><td>

The plane that will be transformed.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

</td><td>

[Matrix4x4](doc/markdown/./base.matrix4x4.md)


</td><td>

The transform matrix.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

result


</td><td>

[Plane](doc/markdown/./base.plane.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ A plane object to which the result will be written, if not specified, a new plane object will be returned.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[Plane](doc/markdown/./base.plane.md)

The result plane.
